item.description: We'll meet between 6:30-6:45 p.m. and order up some food. (You pay for what you eat/drink.) Stump Trivia starts around 7:30 p.m. Please don't be late or show up without RSVPing; otherwise you may not get on a team or find a seat. For those not familiar, Stump Trivia is a fun, FREE competitive team trivia game played in the bar. For information about The Pickled Onion, including directions and menu, click on the link below. The Pickled Onion For more information on Stump Trivia, visit http://stumptrivia.co.... Hope to see you then!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me (Tammy); there are a few photos of me posted on my profile. I'm 5'1" and I'm usually wearing glasses. I should be pretty easy to find.
item.name: Stump Trivia at The Pickled Onion in Beverly
